alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, Forest, southeastern Vilas, western Florence, northern Marathon, eastern Oneida and Langlade Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Phelps to 11 miles west of Headwaters Wilderness to Harrison to New Wood Wildlife Area to 8 miles northwest of Medford. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Harrison, Phelps and Kentuck Lake Campground around 740 PM CDT. Parrish around 750 PM CDT. Merrill and Council Grounds State Park around 755 PM CDT. Crandon and Dutch Corners around 800 PM CDT. Tipler, North Otter Creek Natural Area, Veterans Memorial County Park and Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 805 PM CDT. Pearson around 810 PM CDT. Fern, Whisker Lake Wilderness and Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 815 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Gagen, Luna-White Deer Campground, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, Ackley Wildlife Area, Bastile Lake Natural Area, Kelly Lynn Bog Natural Area, Otter Springs Recreation Area, Choate, Bavaria and Deerbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Vilas
